price: 你的养主的言辞，诚实极了，公平极了。绝没有人能变更他的言辞。他确是全聪的，确是全知的。
arabic: وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ صِدۡقٗا وَعَدۡلٗاۚ لَّا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: watammat kalimatu rabbika ṣid'qan waʿadlan lā mubaddila likalimātihi wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
